Package helpers

Classes that are not part of the mvc pattern.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Piece
    Interface that every game piece must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Fox
    Class to represent a Fox of the game.
    FoxTest  
    GameBuilder
    Helper class to initialize the populate the board with pieces, thus creating an initial boars state.
    GameBuilderTest  
    Move
    Immutable class Move represents a move from one point to anther.
    MoveTest  
    Mushroom
    Class that represents a mushroom piece in the game.
    MushroomTest  
    Rabbit
    Class that represents a rabbit piece in the game.
    RabbitTest  
    Square
    The Square class represents one square in the Board.
    SquareTest  
  • Enum Summary

    Directions that the fox may face.
